author: kess
msg: Added two examples for Base/non-Base modules
Removed accidential comment around the xml-stylesheet.

author: grisha
msg: Filter chaining now works "better", i.e. multiple mod_python filters act
as expected without hanging or segfaulting.
Passing output of a mod_python filter to mod_include works fine, but not
the other way around for some reason mod_include gives an empty brigade?

author: bnicholes
msg: Moving the auth_provider APIs into the core binary to avoid a chicken and
egg problem when loading the auth modules vs the providers.  (Can't load the
auth module until the provider has registered.  Can't register the provider until
the auth module is loaded and APIs are available.)

author: kess
msg: german translation based on install.xml r.1.4
